author: Xbox
description:
ILL is a realistic first-person action horror game that takes you into a dark fort overtaken by a mysterious entity. Unpredictable monsters, a visceral dismemberment system, and realistic physics create an atmosphere of relentless terror.

WISHLIST NOW.
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/ill/9NN0NG9WGP4S

The game developers, Team Clout, are horror experts and have experience working with well-known directors. Now, they’re aiming to create a game that will claw its way into your consciousness and expose your true fears layer by layer.

author: Xbox
description:
Become an elite SWAT commander and bring order to a city overwhelmed by chaos and corruption.

Lead a team of highly-trained SWAT officers through unpredictable high-risk missions against ruthless criminals to prevent the city from spiralling into disorder. Equip real-world weapons and gear to tackle missions inspired by current events against Los Sueňos’ ruthless criminal element. 

Every decision, from squad selection to tactical breach and engagement is the difference between life and death.

Are you ready?

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/ready-or-not-pre-order-bundle/9P509TCB36H0/0017

author: Xbox
description:
The Xbox Games Showcase just revealed what’s next—now it’s your turn to play.

With Game Pass, it’s yours to explore. New titles are added regularly, so there’s always a new world to dive into. Dive into a curated library spanning blockbuster hits and critically acclaimed indie gems like The Outer Worlds 2, KEEPER, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, South of Midnight, Towerborne, and more. Become a Game Pass member for one low monthly price and jump into the adventure across console, PC, and cloud.

Join Game Pass today at http://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass
*Some content shown is not actual gameplay. Game catalog and features vary by plan, region, and over time. xbox.com/gamepass
From massive blockbusters to critically acclaimed hits and unexpected gems, Game Pass delivers it all.

Join millions of players experiencing the latest must-plays — like The Outer Worlds 2, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and Keeper. With new games dropping regularly, there’s always a new adventure waiting. Become a Ga
title: Game Pass — All Of This

author: Xbox
description:
On this episode of The Official Xbox Podcast, we're heading back to the stars with The Outer Worlds 2! Obsidian Entertainment's Brandon Adler and Matt Singh are here to walk us through the world and factions of Arcadia, each with their own looks, environments, radio stations, and... cable management?

00:00 Introduction
02:50 The Opening Cinematic!
06:04 Trailer Walkthrough
10:26 Meet The Factions
13:59 Conflict Between The Factions
20:03 Visual Storytelling
26:17 Radio Stations
31:42 Final Thoughts

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast

author: Xbox
description:
wheels are in motion and fates are shifting

The ride begins when Wheel World rolls onto Xbox Series X|S and Game Pass on July 23, 2025

Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/wheel-world/9NGCFDHR2MV3/0010

Welcome to Wheel World, where the fate of the universe rests on your handlebars.

You are Kat, a young cyclist with one mission: save Wheel World from total collapse. Explore a stunning open world filled with impressive vistas, hidden secrets, and races that will test your skills. Customize your bike with an endless array of parts, from sleek speedsters to off-road beasts—there's no limit to how you can ride.

Song: “Hold On” by JOON

Developed by Messhof. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2025

author: Xbox
description:
"Clair Obscur Expedition 33 is a once in a generation title that transcends gaming, and approaches a work of art." _Fextralife

It has been a year since we revealed Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, and we've been deeply moved by the reception of the game. It's been an incredible journey.

Millions of you have embarked on the greatest expedition in history, listened to the OST, grieved, celebrated, and shared your stories, fan art, and support in ways that continue to inspire.

From the first reveal to this moment, your journey has shaped ours, and we’re honoured that critics around the world have recognised the magic of Expedition 33.

Tomorrow comes. Always.

https://www.xbox.com/games/expedition-33
